org.jppf.management

Interface JPPFAdminMBean

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JPPFDriverAdminMBean, JPPFNodeAdminMBean
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JMXConnectionWrapper, JMXDriverConnectionWrapper, JMXNodeConnectionWrapper

    public interface JPPFAdminMBean
extends Serializable
    Management interface for the administration of a JPPF component, driver or node.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DRIVER_MBEAN_NAME
      Deprecated. 
      use JPPFDriverAdminMBean.MBEAN_NAME instead.
      static String DRIVER_SUFFIX
      RMI registry namespace suffix for drivers.
      static String NODE_MBEAN_NAME
      Deprecated. 
      use JPPFNodeAdminMBean.MBEAN_NAME instead.
      static String NODE_SUFFIX
      RMI registry namespace suffix for nodes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JPPFSystemInformation systemInformation()
      Get detailed information about the node's JVM properties, environment variables and runtime information such as memory usage and available processors.

    • Field Detail

      • DRIVER_SUFFIX

        static final String DRIVER_SUFFIX
        RMI registry namespace suffix for drivers.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NODE_SUFFIX

        static final String NODE_SUFFIX
        RMI registry namespace suffix for nodes.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NODE_MBEAN_NAME

        static final String NODE_MBEAN_NAME
        Deprecated. use JPPFNodeAdminMBean.MBEAN_NAME instead.
        Name of the node's admin MBean.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DRIVER_MBEAN_NAME

        static final String DRIVER_MBEAN_NAME
        Deprecated. use JPPFDriverAdminMBean.MBEAN_NAME instead.
        Name of the driver's admin MBean.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • systemInformation

        JPPFSystemInformation systemInformation()
                                        throws Exception
        Get detailed information about the node's JVM properties, environment variables and runtime information such as memory usage and available processors.
        Returns:
        a JPPFSystemInformation instance.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs.
